abstracts.cdata!:
This amendment to the Loan Agreement
            reflects the proposed restructuring of the Social Sector
            Development Project, combined with an extension of the
            closing date by June 30, 2007. The key elements of this
            restructuring are: 1)  Reduction in the allocation of loan
            proceeds, reflecting the ability of the unemployment fund to
            finance these services to a major extent. 2) Increase in the
            allocation of loan proceeds to the Pension Administration
            sub-component, to enable the completion of the computerized
            management information system. 3) Reduction in the
            allocation of loan proceeds to the Pension Supervision
            Commission (PSC) sub-component, reflecting the resulting
            efficiency gains. 4) Loan proceeds allocation to various
            subcomponents, reflecting either, the fact that anticipated
            bilateral grant finance for this activity, did not
            materialize, or recognition of higher cost-effectiveness,
            both in information technology, or systems design.
